name: Graveyard of Wandering Souls
desc: If your monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY while this card is already face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone: Special Summon 1 "Fireball Token" (Pyro/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100). If a monster(s) is sent from your hand and/or field to the GY by an opponent's card effect while this card is already face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone: Special Summon as many "Fireball Tokens" as possible, up to the number of monsters sent. You can only use this effect of "Graveyard of Wandering Souls" once per turn.
